instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no battery indicator led
threads.message: Hi , like the title said, <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> all function is normal, but the batt indicator doesnt light up, i have tried known good bil flex, but still same, i peel the black rubber beside j6955, but doesnt found anything looking bad.., any clue?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no battery indicator led
threads.message: Check continuity, between MLB and BIL circuitry, for the lines of pins 4, 6, 8 of J6955.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no battery indicator led
threads.message: Thanks, thereâ€™s a broken trace at pin 8 which lead to <CAPACITOR>C6954</CAPACITOR> and its probe point, a bit of jumper and the battery indicator light up! Thankss
